channel.title: 实验 on 迷失的星云
channel.description: Recent content in 实验 on 迷失的星云

item.title: procedure of dry transfer
item.description: Clean the beaker in ultrasound with acetone then IPA then DI water Note: make sure no residual of acetone in the beaker because acetone may react with chloroform and produce explosive compounds. Dissolve polycarbonate in chloroform, mass ratio 6% (6%~10%), using ultrasound to accelerate the dissolution Note: must wear a mask when using chloroform because chloroform can generate $\mathrm{COCl_2}$ (10 times toxicity of $\mathrm{Cl_2}$) under light Clean 3 glass slides

item.title: 如何制作PDMS
item.description: 今天试着做了一下PDMS，步骤如下： 将Base与Agent按质量比7:1(10:1)混合搅拌10min。 将混合物倒入干净的培养皿中 将培养皿平
